description: This wasn't a very eventful day at first. So many annoying women wanted to get a job but couldn't afford to pay our mediation fee. Well, I wasn't going to help them. I almost started to give up hope when the catch of the day arrived. He was a 23 years old welder, who got fed up with his job and trade. He wanted to completely reinvent his career. The guy was looking for a sociable job in gastronomy and was willing to go through all the obstacles there might be. He even wanted to learn foreign languages! Of course, I couldn't ignore such a dedicated young man. I knew he would do a lot to get his dream job and I was right. Soon he was standing in my office completely naked and masturbating his beautiful cock. Obviously, I wanted to do a lot more. The boy was a bit reluctant but eventually agreed.
title: Dirty Scout 191
